# KashCal

**A private, offline-first calendar for Android.**

---

 **Private** 路  **Offline** 路  **Syncs** 路  **Open Source**

---

</div>

## Welcome

KashCal is a calendar for Android that works completely offline, with optional CalDAV sync for iCloud, Nextcloud, Ba茂kal, Radicale, and others. No analytics, no tracking, no KashCal account required.

## Who It's For

People who want a good calendar app that doesn't phone home. Whether you self-host with Nextcloud, still use iCloud after switching to Android, or just want something that works offline, KashCal does the job.

## Projects

| Repository | Description |
|------------|-------------|
| [KashCal](https://github.com/KashCal/KashCal) | Privacy-first calendar for Android |
| [KashCake](https://github.com/KashCal/KashCake) | Never forget a Cake Day (birthday) |
| [iCalDAV](https://github.com/icaldav/icaldav) | CalDAV/ICS library for Kotlin/Java |

## Contributing

We welcome bug reports, feature requests, testing, and code contributions. If you find a CalDAV server that doesn't work, [let us know](https://github.com/KashCal/KashCal/issues).
